Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres; exterior, from rim: band of blobs; stopt maeander running left; dot and billet pattern between pairs of dilute lines; below, painted decoration consisting possibly of part of animal’s rump, with red, to right.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 260, no. 507)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0486) (phase 2)
